name: PocketHost
title: pockethost.io
shortDescription: PocketHost simplifies backend configuration, allowing developers to focus on building features for web apps. It offers a quick setup with no server provisioning or Docker configuration, providing a BaaS solution with features like database management, SSL, authentication, and cloud functions. Ideal for developers looking to launch apps quickly without managing infrastructure.
pros: Quick setup with no server provisioning
Integrated features like database, SSL, and authentication
Supports custom cloud functions and transactional emails
cons: Limited to SQLite, which may not scale as well as other databases
May not offer the flexibility of fully customizable backend solutions
Dependent on the continued service and support of PocketHost
